name: Cost Of Colors
description:
Made for the 48 secret jam of May 2018.

! MAC ONLY !

You are a colour hunter on a black and white planet. But sometimes meteorites fall from the sky and bring crystals. Break and collect those coloured crystal to make a living. And buy stuff from the shop.

Also here be spiders apparently...

MOVE : W A S D

SHOOT : Left click

Shovel : Right click

Aim : Move the mouse around. Sorry it's a bit clunky
